subdisciplines.name: Software Requirements
subdisciplines.description: The process of determining software requirements, documenting them in a systematic way, and managing changes to them

subdisciplines.name: Software Design
subdisciplines.description: The process of defining the architecture, components, interfaces, and other characteristics of a system or component.

subdisciplines.name: Software Construction
subdisciplines.description: The activity of creating software by writing and maintaining the source code

subdisciplines.name: Software Testing
subdisciplines.description: The process of evaluating the software or system against the intended or expected behavior

subdisciplines.name: Software Maintenance
subdisciplines.description: The process of modifying a software system or component after delivery to correct faults, improve performance or other aspects of the system, or adapt it to a changed environment
